column4: G'day from New Zealand everyone! It is 7;07am local &  I have been up all night battling with DVD playback : OS: Ubuntu 10:04 Lucid Lynx; LG Multi DVD (Burn/Play); have tried Movie Player; VLC: & Kaffiene; DISK PLAYS OK IN DEDICATED TV/VIDEO PLAYR NOTFORMAT NOR CSS PROBLEM! (BTW i am slightly disabled, so reply's may be slow...)
VLC and mplayer are your best bets, you might need to remove protection, try handbreak
